text: Theresa Veronica Breuer (later Teresa Brewer; May 7, 1931 â€“ October 17, 2007) was an American singer. She sang pop, country music and R&B.; She was very popular in the 1950s. Brewer's novelty songs included the hit song "Music! Music! Music!". Brewer was born in Toledo, Ohio. She died in New Rochelle, New York at age 76. title: Teresa Brewer
